name: All Social Video Downloader
description: All Social video downloader is the best video downloader that allows you to download videos from social media and video websites into your device. Video downloader tool auto detects videos, you can download them with just one click. The powerful download manager allows you to pause and resume downloads, download in the background and download several files at the same time. Preview the video first, fast download and play it offline.  Features All Social Video Downloader: * Full-featured download manager: pause, resume and delete downloads * Support quick download with public video url or Browse videos with the built-in browser * Download video no limted * Download video, music and movie file * Download audio file (mp3,m4a) file * Play videos offline with the built-in video player * Support many types of files: Mp3, Mp4, m4a, mov, avi, flv, m4v ... * HD,2k,4k video download supported * Auto detect videos and easily download all video * Download several files at the same time * Download video in the background * Download files to SD card * Check the progress at anytime  * No Login required * Download all social video from internet * Download pictures or repost on Instagram * Save videos and pictures in your gallery * Share your favorite videos and pictures with others * Simply use, just 3 STEPS to download  How to download by all video downloader: 1. Search video by built-in browser 2. Click the video you want to download 3. The application will automatically detect videos 4. Tap the download button 5. Done! Open download file if you want!  NOTICE: 1. Respect the rights of the Instagram users. 2. Any unauthorized actions (re-uploading or downloading of contents) and/or violations of intellectual property rights is the sole responsibility of the user. 3. This app is not affiliated with Instagram.  Permissions required: 1. NetWork permissions will be required if you wish to download files using your device using Image Downloader. 2. Storage Permissions will be required if you wish to: download photos & videos onto your device or SD card.  Thank you very much.
